name: Cyber Shooter: Open World
description:
Cyber Shooter: Open World, The aftermath of you completing Cyber Shooter: The game of '21. This game is in the middle of the time line, 2 months before the game of '22, a big release. And the game of '21. After you complete this game, you will l have to wait for the yearly game to come. The game of '22 will be similar with mechanics, but better in a way that it will run faster, have better graphics, and have a bigger story line ending. There will be a game after that as I'd like to keep the saga going. In this game you can shoot zombies, set off nukes, shoot RPGs and more! This game is for the most part finished.

To win, Get 500 kills, nearly 10x more kills than the 2021 version. (And 20x more than the mobile version.)
